column2:
"Yo <%me>!
You seem to be doing fine in ARKS."

"I heard a lot of good things
about you."

"I know that you are capable,
but you should take a break too."
"Ah, Io! Hey, over here!"

"Io!\u3000It's been a while!
Doing fine?"
"It's been a while. Although in my case, I've been seeing you around."

"Other than your Live concerts,
that broadcast half a year ago too."

"Ahh,<%me>
was in trouble then.
Feels kinda nostalgic recalling it."
"Senpai and Quna know each other huh."

"I got acquainted with Io,
the same way I got to know you
<%me>. Are you surprised?"
"I worked together with Afin and Io during an ARKS project once."
"It was really tough that time."
"Ugh... I am sorry for that..."
"It's fine. It was a good memory for me."
"More importantly Io, you haven't changed your appearance eh."

"Quna...
Not that topic again."

"Hey, <%me>.
What do you think?"
"1. Agreed."
"2. I think it's fine."

"Senpai too!
Man, give me a break."

"Hmm, I see. That was Afin's
opinion as well."

"Man, give me a break. Why are
the two of you talking about me."

"Io has the potential, it would
be a waste to not use it."

"I'll do a makeover for you
from your head to toe okay?
Perhaps you could be an idol too!
Wanna give it a try?"

"Q-Quit joking around!
I definitely don't wish to be an
idol."

"Ahh, she left. I didn't mean
to be rude..."

"Seeing people smiling and dancing
to their favorite songs that I
sing. Such happiness is nice."
